title: Looking for a coach

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tl5sveEz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-21T00:44:59.772+0000)
>
> http://sydneycoachterminal.com.au/

Unfortunately I heard they can only teach things about mechanics, but not about kiting
Keen As master tier mid /jg main add me for details
Might be fun, I'm a diamond jungle main, could watch a game or something and give you some basic pointers.

**[Purplesidegg](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/EV6P9OEw-coaching)** (diamond) and **[best khazix oce](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=26126)** (diamond/master) both offer A+ coaching for your roles at reasonable rates. 

In terms of free coaching, [**Litharrale**](http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=61956) is probably the highest ranked coach for free unless you find somone here on the boards. 

Good luck ♥
